messages.subject: cooking?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/23/02 10:42:07 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/23/02 10:42:07 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Well, I guess that you would need to know Kyle. He has been sitting on
counters since he was around 18 months. >>

Jalen too.
He is often found in the sink (20months now) or "helping" me with doing
dishes, since water play is a fave activity.
He is also very, very interested in watching us cook and being involved.
Sierra has been cutting up food and cooking since toddler age.
At five, she is quite proficient in the kitchen and rarely asks for help
anymore, except when it comes to items requiring the stove.
She can microwave a mean bag of popcorn!! :)

Ren
